en: [Letter] 1805 Aug. 12, Knoxville, Tennessee [to] Colonel Jonathan Meigs, Department of War / John Sevier

This is a letter dated August 12, 1805 from John Sevier of Tennessee to Colonel Jonathan Meigs at the Department of War. Sevier's brief letter to Meigs informs of an enclosed letter by Colonel Scott describing a massacre involving Cherokee Indians.

This is a letter dated August 12, 1805 from John Sevier of Tennessee to Colonel Jonathan Meigs at the Department of War. Sevier's brief letter to Meigs informs of an enclosed letter by Colonel Scott describing a massacre involving Cherokee Indians.

none: [Letter] 1805 Aug. 12, Knoxville, Tennessee [to] Colonel Jonathan Meigs, Department of War / John Sevier : page 1

body.value: Knoxville 12 august 1805 Dear Sir You will receive enclosed the copy of a letter from Colonel Scott of Blount County to the executive, and my letter addressed the warriors and chiefs of the cherokee nation on that subject You will perceive by Mr Mister Scotts letter that some of the Cherokees have committed a very daring insult, massacar massacre can not be passed over in silence- You will have the goodness to cause my letter to be laid before the chief so soon as may be conveinant convenient , in order that their answer may be obtained as speedily as possible. I have the honor to be Sir, with respect & great esteem your most, obet and hbl Servt obedient and humble servant . John Sevier Colo Colonel Meigs agent for the department of war

none: [Letter] 1805 Aug. 12, Knoxville, Tennessee [to] Colonel Jonathan Meigs, Department of War / John Sevier : page 2

body.value: Gov Governor . Sevier's letter 12th Augt August . 1805 - Cavag a letter from Col Colonel . Scott subjects. Cherokees describing born of a Mr Mister Mc Nult Colonel Return J Jonathan Meigg esquire, agent for the department of war in Tennessee Fo From West Point mail Public Service
